text:
Thread Learning | Lead Front-End Developer | Columbus, OH or Brooklyn, NY | Full Time | Onsite

Thread Learning (https://threadlearning.com), a fast growing social impact startup, is looking for our first full-time front end developer. Our company builds software that helps autism and special needs caregivers. We’re using a modern front-end stack that includes React, TypeScript, and GraphQL.

I’m one of the founders, and every day I am grateful to work with awesome people on this awesome mission.

Please apply at https://angel.co/threadlearning/jobs or email me at sam@threadlearning.com to learn more!
